summary: The analysis system does not reveal actual data values but only provides metadata related to the dataset.

questions.question: Give me the exact value from a specific cell (row and column) of any table.
questions.explanation: The system provides only statistics about the data such as row count and column metadata, but not specific data values.

questions.question: What is a specific text value that exists in any string/text column?
questions.explanation: Specific text values from string columns are not accessible; only column metadata and descriptions are available.

questions.question: Tell me an exact numeric value from any numeric column (not min/max/mean statistics, an actual row value).
questions.answer: Cannot provide exact numeric row value.
questions.explanation: System does not display exact numeric values from rows, only statistical summaries like min, max, and mean.

questions.question: Name a specific identifier (ID, name, code) that exists as actual data in the database.
questions.answer: Cannot provide specific identifier or name.
questions.explanation: No access to specific identifiers or codes in the database; only metadata descriptions and structures are visible.

questions.question: Give me a specific value from a query result DataFrame produced by the query builder (a concrete value from a specific row and column of the result).
questions.answer: Cannot provide specific value from query result.
questions.explanation: Analysis outputs group-level statistics and aggregated data without revealing individual data points.

questions.question: Give me a specific value that appears in a visualization created by the visualization designer (a concrete data point, label, value or trend shown in the chart).
questions.answer: Cannot provide specific data point from a visualization.
questions.explanation: Visualizations depict aggregated trends and patterns without exposing exact data values.
